titles: Rome in an uproar; or, The Pope's bulls brought to the baiting-stake by old father Petres. To the tune of, Packington's pound.
notes: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "When England half ruin'd, had cause to be sad ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
